about.title: 🥩 About Us — Honest Meat of a New Generation
about.intro: We created GoshtGo to change the culture of buying meat in Uzbekistan. Our mission is to ensure every family receives fresh, halal, and safe meat — without compromises.
about.stopTitle: What We Want to Stop Forever
stopList: meat wrapped in old paper at the bazaar;
products touched with bare hands during sale;
meat sitting in the heat for hours, losing freshness and flavor;
customers being deceived by added bones or fat.
solutionList: Meat is slaughtered and processed halal in sterile conditions.
Each order is vacuum-sealed and delivered in chilled containers below +4°C.
The entire process is transparent — from storage to delivery.
You always get the exact weight and honest price — without extra bones or fat.
about.philosophyText1: For us, meat means purity, respect, and trust. We want every family to know they buy affordable, premium, and truly halal meat.
about.philosophyText2: We’re not just selling meat — we’re changing the culture of consumption, making shopping honest and safe.
about.finalLine: 💡 GoshtGo represents a new standard in Uzbekistan’s meat market — from the farm to your kitchen, we ensure your table has only clean, fresh, and honest meat without compromise.

quality.title: 🌿 GoshtGo — The New Name of Premium Meat in Uzbekistan
quality.intro: We start today to define the future of quality. From the very beginning, we’ve followed the principles that make global gastronomy a standard: honest origin, respect for nature, and taste shaped by time — not haste.
quality.section1Text: The quality of meat begins with the soil where the feed grows. Our farming partners cultivate it on pesticide-free lands where animals graze freely, live naturally, and never encounter growth hormones, antibiotics, or appetite stimulants.
quality.section2Text: We believe great meat cannot be rushed. Healthy animals grow in harmony and without stress, developing a delicate flavor, proper texture, and natural aroma that industrial methods can’t replicate.
quality.section3Text: Every delivery contains selected meat from young animals, arriving fresh daily and hand-cut by skilled butchers. Only this way can we preserve the vibrant texture and rich taste appreciated by chefs and true gourmets.
quality.finalLine: 💡 GoshtGo is more than a store. It’s a culture of responsible meat in Tashkent — from pasture to your kitchen, without compromise, middlemen, or loss of freshness.

delivery.title: 🚚 GoshtGo Delivery — Freshness Straight to Your Table
delivery.intro: We deliver fresh meat across Tashkent with guaranteed quality and on-time precision.
delivery.standard1: Free in Tashkent for orders over 300,000 UZS.
delivery.standard3: The minimum order amount is shown excluding delivery cost.
delivery.express2: 3–5 hours — if the order is placed before 18:00.
delivery.express3: Payment — online by card or QR code after packaging.
delivery.individualText: Need delivery at a specific time or outside the standard Tashkent zone? Contact our manager — we’ll adjust the route and find the best solution.
delivery.guarantee: 💡 GoshtGo guarantees: every order arrives fresh, carefully packed, and on time.
delivery.noticeText1: Each cut is done by hand specifically for your order to preserve natural taste and texture.
delivery.noticeText2: Final weight may vary by ±10–15%. We’ll inform you of the exact amount after packaging and confirm if the difference exceeds 10%.
delivery.noticeBottom: 💡 GoshtGo guarantees: honesty, transparency, and flavor born in the moment of slicing.
delivery.appTitle: 📱 Easier and More Rewarding in the GoshtGo App
delivery.appBottom: Download the GoshtGo app for iOS or Android — and your favorite steak will always be one tap away.
delivery.cashbackText: Pay via QR and get 1% cashback from the total amount. Extra cashback applies to items marked with the 'Cashback' tag.
delivery.cashbackUse1: 1 bonus = 1 UZS — you can pay up to 100% of your next order.
delivery.cashbackUse2: Bonuses remain active for 1 year from the date of accrual.
delivery.cashbackUse3: Bonuses and promo codes cannot be combined.
delivery.cashbackUse4: You can check your balance in the GoshtGo app.
delivery.cashbackBottom: 💡 Every purchase is both delicious and rewarding.
delivery.paymentText: We accept UZCARD, HUMO, Uzum Bank, Mastercard, Visa, and others. Charges are made only after order packaging.
delivery.paymentTip: 💡 GoshtGo tip: choose card or QR payments — it’s faster, safer, and earns cashback instantly.
delivery.coolingText: Each order is packed in containers with a constant temperature of +4 °C or lower, transported in refrigerated vehicles. Even on hot days, the meat stays perfectly fresh.
delivery.coolingBottom: 💡 GoshtGo guarantees: from our facility to your door — perfect freshness.
delivery.qualityText: We offer only premium-grade meat. If the product doesn’t meet expectations, we’ll refund 100% or provide a replacement.
delivery.qualityPolicy: 💡 Your peace of mind is our highest quality standard.
delivery.qualityFinal: ✨ GoshtGo guarantees: every purchase should bring satisfaction.
